message: Let's split the money 60/40. A fair deal to start with, don't you think?
I think it's only fair we split the money evenly. Let's be reasonable, this is a good offer.
Bob, let's be realistic. I'm offering you 45 which is better than what you'll get if we keep playing this game. Time is running out!
We've both been stubborn so far.  Let's just split it evenly and move on.  The longer we play, the less we both get.
